item.title: Developer Experience at Pinterest: The Journey to PinConsole
item.description: ğŸš€ Pinterest has introduced PinConsole, an Internal Developer Platform (IDP) aimed at simplifying the developer experience. This initiative addresses increasing complexity and improves engineering velocity for over 550 million users. ğŸ” The team identified challenges such as tool fragmentation and inconsistent workflows, which were hindering productivity. By leveraging Backstage, PinConsole creates a unified interface, allowing engineers to focus on business logic. ğŸ“ˆ Early adoption shows…
